text: Nabiyow kok duma Ni farmoytiitik hebeltô farmoyta maruubinninooy, hebeltô Nabii maruubinnino usuk Yallih kitab yakriye waqdi sheetan kay kiraatet was-wasaa kee ceelalloola qida kaa akke waytek, sinam usuk yakriyem katattaamak waasamkeh, Kinnih immay Yalli sheetan qida waswasa baysah, tohuk lakat Yalli isi aayootay baxxaqqa itta arcisah, kaadu Yalli ixxigali, Naggaara
